data.title: Jeffrey "Jeff" Gordon Obituary 2024
authors: Davenport Family Funeral Homes And Crematory
data.meta_description: Jeffrey "Jeff" Gordon, 51, a longtime resident of Cary, passed away peacefully on January 1, 2024. He was born on February 2, 1972 in Elgin, IL to Patrick and Barbara Gordon....
data.meta_site_name: Davenport Family Funeral Homes And Crematory
data.text:
Jeffrey “Jeff” Gordon, 51, a longtime resident of Cary, passed away peacefully on January 1, 2024. He was born on February 2, 1972 in Elgin, IL to Patrick and Barbara Gordon.

Jeff graduated from Cary-Grove High School in 1990, where he was part of the band and swing choir. He was a union sheet metal worker. Jeff enjoyed sports, especially the Bears, Blackhawks and White Sox. Jeff was a good person who will be missed by all who knew him. Jeff is survived by his parents, his sister, Jill (Paul) Camilleri; his extended family and many friends.

Visitation will be Sunday, January 7, 2024 from 2 PM until the funeral service at 5:30 PM at Davenport Family Funeral Home and Crematory, 419 E. Terra Cotta Ave. (Rte. 176), Crystal Lake, IL 60014. Interment will be private.
